snippet.title: Fujifilm X-T1: Brand New Compact DSLR-Style Camera Packed With Innovation
snippet.description: Fujifilm has rapidly established itself as the Apple of the digital photography world with its slew of new digital cameras based around compact mirrorless bodies, Fujinon interchangeable lenses and an analogue feel that harks back to the days of film. The cameras have become firm favourites with enthusiasts trying to [...] read »

snippet.title: Samsung 3D Flash Memory Promises Better Solid-State Drives
snippet.description: I thought that tech hiccups in flash memory would make me wait a few years to see the mobile device of my dreams. Samsung's 3D memory architecture may have brought that device closer to reality faster than previously possible. read »

snippet.title: Can AMD's Newest APU Play Your Favorite Games Without A Dedicated Graphics Card? (Part 1)
snippet.description: The question for PC users is whether or not the newest desktop APUs from AMD are a viable option for a budget gaming build -- without the expensive graphics card attached. read »

snippet.title: SanDisk Dials Up $45 With World's Fastest Mobile Device Memory Card
snippet.description: The new SanDisk card is designed to tap into this market, enabling customers to record high-definition videos, even in 3D. read »

snippet.title: Storage Observations From the Open Compute Project
snippet.description: This was a busy week for digital storage meetings with the Facebook sponsored Open Compute Project Summit right across the street from the SNIA Winter Symposium and the Non-Volatile Memory Storage Industry Summit. I want to talk about both events and their implications to the future of digital storage. This [...] read »

snippet.title: Sony Alpha 7: The World's Lightest Full-Frame Camera With Interchangeable Lens
snippet.description: It’s been a few years since I last reviewed a full-frame Sony DSLR camera. Back in those days the design of Sony’s flagship models had a rather chunky and unsophisticated feel but that's no longer the case, as I found out when I got the chance to test-drive the company's [...] read »

snippet.title: The future of memory
snippet.description: Look out, Intel: ferroelectric chips are fast, compact and energy-efficient. read »

snippet.title: A PDA With A Long Memory
snippet.description: A week or two without a recharge can zap the data on your PDA. Toshiba's latest Pocket PCs change that. read »
